alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 23 at 1:12PM MDT until October 24 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TUESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TUESDAY TO NOON MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations between 3 to 6 inches in the mountains, and 1 to 2 inches at lower elevations. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 8 inches Tuesday night through Wednesday morning. * WHERE...East Glacier Park Region. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until Noon MDT Tuesday. For the Winter Storm Warning, from Noon Tuesday to Noon MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
